Headline: Temporary #34 South Michigan Reroute near 131st//Eberhart
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses temp. rerouted near 131st//Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 131st//Eberhart.

Southbound buses will operate via 130th, Evans, 131st, and resume normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via 131st, Evans, 130th, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
